This recording was made at night, in a valley. About 400 meters away from the recorder there is a big](/podcast/autumn-night/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Incoming Tide at Gold Bluffs Beach - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Incoming Tide at Gold Bluffs Beach - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/77739edec966657eda7ff0b4f32d856c/be5ed/23-Felix-Blume-Waves-in-the-sea-in-the-gulf-of-Mexico-scaled.jpg)### Incoming Tide at Gold Bluffs Beach

-----------------------------

5 new podcast episodes published this month.

[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Autumn Night - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Autumn Night - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/6ee7a5547f4a27e627fba151b5275edf/be5ed/21-Felix-Blume-Toads-singing-with-nice-rythmic-patterns-during-the-night-in-Brazil-scaled.jpg)### Autumn Night

This recording was made at night, in a valley. About 400 meters away from the recorder there is a big](/podcast/autumn-night/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Incoming Tide at Gold Bluffs Beach - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Incoming Tide at Gold Bluffs Beach - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/77739edec966657eda7ff0b4f32d856c/be5ed/23-Felix-Blume-Waves-in-the-sea-in-the-gulf-of-Mexico-scaled.jpg)### Incoming Tide at Gold Bluffs Beach

This was recorded on a cloudy evening during an incoming tide on Gold Bluffs Beach in Prairie Creek Redwoods State](/podcast/incoming-tide-at-gold-bluffs-beach/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Pine Forest - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Pine Forest - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/5a08a0a8d8a454c46d0546f52ef3f8a7/be5ed/soundscape-art-16-.jpg)### Pine Forest

The sounds of a pine forest in spring in Dalarna county, Sweden. A variety of bird species sing including Common](/podcast/pine-forest/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Falling Snowflakes - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Falling Snowflakes - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/50580f0fa41615fec0c7b2649b845927/be5ed/284_Heavy-snowfall-in-the-beech-forest-scaled.jpg)### Falling Snowflakes

In the first weeks of 2024, finally, a real winter has arrived with beautiful snowfall and temperatures of -19°C. A](/podcast/falling-snowflakes/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Spring Thunderstorm at White Deer Lake - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Spring Thunderstorm at White Deer Lake - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/edcac4c4d41b1e544b6ea611aa985984/be5ed/291_Summer-thunderstorm-mountain-ridge-scaled.jpg)### Spring Thunderstorm at White Deer Lake

This was recorded on a spring day in the forest near White Deer Lake, a seasonal lake in Shasta-Trinity National](/podcast/spring-thunderstorm-at-white-deer-lake/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Lake in an Ecuadorian Jungle - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Lake in an Ecuadorian Jungle - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/bf4cd33e1a03b7d87d0fcdf753ec7557/be5ed/20-Jungle-Sounds-scaled.jpg)### Lake in an Ecuadorian Jungle

Early in the morning I walk along a remote lake in Ecuador’s lower Amazon basin. Far from a city, road,](/podcast/lake-in-an-ecuadorian-jungle/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Pambar Shola - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Pambar Shola - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/1528087ab698156c45baba6de719e764/be5ed/360_Pambar-Shola--scaled.jpg)### Pambar Shola

To record a soundscape characteristic of this region – and attempt to encapsulate my observational thoughts and views as a](/podcast/pambar-shola/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Artist Talks: Axel Drioli - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Artist Talks: Axel Drioli - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/fdc9611966de0cdefe58c38db4e6234c/be5ed/soundscape-art-27.jpg)### Artist Talks: Axel Drioli

Eight episodes went by so fast! Symbolically, this episode with Axel was the first one to be recorded. Since our](/podcast/artist-talks-axel-drioli/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Thailand Rainforest Night - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Thailand Rainforest Night - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/72bc30fb8c5a898af2076b1e176466a4/be5ed/342_Masoala-Peninsula-Madagascar-scaled.jpg)### Thailand Rainforest Night

A calm nocturnal ambience recorded in the rainy season in a tropical rainforest in western Thailand. At this time of](/podcast/thailand-rainforest-night/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Artist Talks: Rüdiger Ortiz-Álvarez - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Artist Talks: Rüdiger Ortiz-Álvarez - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/fdc9611966de0cdefe58c38db4e6234c/be5ed/soundscape-art-27.jpg)### Artist Talks: Rüdiger Ortiz-Álvarez

Hello and welcome to our 7th episode of this special series – only one left for this season to close!](/podcast/artist-talks-rudiger-ortiz-alvarez/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Quiet Morning Chorus at the Kirandich Dam - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Quiet Morning Chorus at the Kirandich Dam - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/88e55db7e188b7063a408d1bad6812fc/be5ed/389_Bombina-Varieta-scaled.jpg)### Quiet Morning Chorus at the Kirandich Dam

Recording by Martha Mutiso](/podcast/quiet-morning-chorus-at-the-kirandich-dam/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Artist Talks: Félix Blume - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm]()![Artist Talks: Félix Blume - wind is the original radio podcast - earth.fm](/static/fdc9611966de0cdefe58c38db4e6234c/be5ed/soundscape-art-27.jpg)### Artist Talks: Félix Blume

4 more posts have just been published.

[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![In the Field 2: Field Recording Conference, July 4–6 2024 - earth.fm]()![In the Field 2: Field Recording Conference, July 4–6 2024 - earth.fm](/static/0ab3f77a73c256d24bd28b6927a514d0/82c11/CRiSAP-In-the-Field-2.png)### In the Field 2: Field Recording Conference, July 4–6 2024

Dear field recordists and sound aficionados, an upcoming conference called In the Field 2 may be of interest. We’re excited](/earth-stories/field-recording-conference-2024/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='333'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![On contemplative sound and the fate of wolves - earth.fm]()![On contemplative sound and the fate of wolves - earth.fm](/static/472b7dd35917d0ec6d6e76daa9d370ad/26cfb/IMG_4366.jpg)### On contemplative sound and the fate of wolves

Ivo Vicic is a sound recordist and music producer whose wildlife field recordings first grabbed my attention during a period](/interviews/on-contemplative-sound-and-the-fate-of-wolves/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='281'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Making the inaudible audible: The unheard songs of trees, fruit, and insects - earth.fm]()![Making the inaudible audible: The unheard songs of trees, fruit, and insects - earth.fm](/static/0b3232758d7e3bb507f4d0ca73656fc2/d3119/phoenix-han-ARCaazwh4xw-unsplash-scaled.jpg)### Making the inaudible audible: The unheard songs of trees, fruit, and insects

Just because we can’t hear something, that doesn’t mean it’s not producing sound. Case in point: the diverse seismic communication](/earth-stories/songs-of-trees-fruit-insects/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='436'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Reflections on deep listening - earth.fm]()![Reflections on deep listening - earth.fm](/static/dd6e750be6979e4b4915920ce83ed9dc/5b393/jeff-finley-FfGSxv4lITs-unsplash-scaled-e1713536272423.jpg)### Reflections on deep listening

Deep listening, for me, is primarily about being there. If you’re not there, you can’t really listen. I think we](/earth-stories/reflections-on-deep-listening/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='353'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Can we make friends with birds? - earth.fm]()![Can we make friends with birds? - earth.fm](/static/25e8dfeee8f1aaddfc23a58dec0023bb/d9479/sergio-capuzzimati-Lr0dNUWVLrE-unsplash-scaled-e1712479601578.jpg)### Can we make friends with birds?

Turkish fisherman Adem Yılmaz would undoubtedly answer in the affirmative. Every spring, after spending half the year in Africa, migratory](/earth-stories/make-friends-with-birds/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='750'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Secret World of Sound reviewed - earth.fm]()![Secret World of Sound reviewed - earth.fm](/static/1f8c07b01d022f0d9ae200053933afad/2ff65/andrew-pons-lylCw4zcA7I-unsplash-scaled.jpg)### Secret World of Sound reviewed

David Attenborough’s new series – the extremely earth.fm-appropriate Secret World of Sound, which we recently previewed – has now been](/earth-stories/attenborough-secret-world-of-sound/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='625'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Anxiety versus birdsong - earth.fm]()![Anxiety versus birdsong - earth.fm](/static/77588731d89f7508c793d49a64f91eaa/38341/diego-ph-cZpEECyOids-unsplash-scaled.jpg)### Anxiety versus birdsong

It may feel that we shouldn’t need scientific evidence to tell us that birdsong is conducive to relaxation. Still… What are](/earth-stories/anxiety-versus-birdsong/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='752'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![David Attenborough enters the ‘Secret World of Sound’ - earth.fm]()![David Attenborough enters the ‘Secret World of Sound’ - earth.fm](/static/8a381622b7b424be6ccdbb6cc5b0110d/eb05e/mike-van-den-bos-7HKdb6i3afk-unsplash-scaled.jpg)### David Attenborough enters the ‘Secret World of Sound’

As anthropophonic sound pollution increasingly mutes the sounds of the natural world, it’s well past time for this subject to](/earth-stories/david-attenborough-the-secret-world-of-sound/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='333'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Ecotherapy: benefits of the great outdoors - earth.fm]()![Ecotherapy: benefits of the great outdoors - earth.fm](/static/a5bcae466f3daedd4c14815877d0eb62/26cfb/silviu-zidaru-DwJqS3QTFpo-unsplash-scaled.jpg)### Ecotherapy: benefits of the great outdoors

Also known as nature therapy, ecotherapy involves activities which take place out of doors, in both urban and rural spaces](/earth-stories/ecotherapy-benefits-of-the-great-outdoors/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='333'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Nature sounds in music - earth.fm]()![Nature sounds in music - earth.fm](/static/c10ff1f4d9e07a9efe485bff908e1dad/26cfb/alex-rose-xWqVolHF6Xc-unsplash-scaled.jpg)### Nature sounds in music

Following our recent article, ‘Eight Pieces of Classical Music Inspired by the Natural World’, we’re pleased to bring you a](/earth-stories/nature-sounds-in-music/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='375'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Seán Ronayne, ornithologist: Sound-recording every bird in Ireland - earth.fm]()![Seán Ronayne, ornithologist: Sound-recording every bird in Ireland - earth.fm](/static/ecb1d2b94afabb237cd454afa5623452/51a07/FkhDV6cXgAA9S4d-scaled.jpg)### Seán Ronayne, ornithologist: Sound-recording every bird in Ireland

Seán Ronayne inherited his life-long love of birds from his father and grandfather. One of his first memories involves being](/interviews/ornithologist-sean-ronayne/)[![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='500'%20width='500'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Field recording failures, managing microplastics, and the charm of carnivorous plants | Newsletter #58 - earth.fm]()![Field recording failures, managing microplastics, and the charm of carnivorous plants | Newsletter #58 - earth.fm](/static/18f32218844b4df842cd64e8a916b9a5/be5ed/351-Langarica-Canyon-scaled.jpg)### Field recording failures, managing microplastics, and the charm of carnivorous plants | Newsletter #58

radio
--------------------------

![sun and wind illustration](/static/8bc99825e95da5b5927d5e8944f46ccb/illustration.svg)Earth.fm is a non-profit, growing library of 800+ immersive natural soundscapes from all over the world. Inspired by the life-changing teachings of Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh, our aspiration is to help each other wake up to the miracle of Mother Earth and do everything in our power to support her.  

**Listen to any episode from the archive or explore the frequently asked questions below.**


[Browse our podcast library](/podcast)We are earth.fmJoin the earth.fmFamily
--------------------------------------

“An Earth Holder\* works to preserve this planet for living beings by taking care of the air, water, and soil.”

Thich Nhat Hanh

Earth.fm seeks to help protect and regenerate natural ecosystems while reconnecting ourselves to the natural world. We are inspired by our passion for soundscape ecology and by the Earth Holder Community created by Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh. We’d love you to join us![Become a member](/become-a-member/)Turn off your  

device and go  

for a walk  

to practice  

deep  

listening.
